content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md)
    code_blocks = collect(re.findall(r'```julia\w*\(.*?\)\n?((?:.|\n)*?)(?:\n|$)', md, re.DOTALL)), String)
    
    # Remove code fences and join code blocks
    joined_code = join(code_blocks, "\n\n"))
    
    return joined_code
end
```
This function uses a regular expression to find all code blocks in the Markdown document. It then removes the code fence marks and joins the code blocks together with a newline.

The resulting string is returned by the `extract_julia_code` function.
